name: GfDesigns
author: GfDesings

sections.description:
With GfDesigns you can create beautiful designs for your Gravity Forms. You don’t need to program anything, in just one click you can make your forms much more modern and attractive for your users!

GfDesigns PRO includes a larger variety of styles and functionalities to better adjust your forms to your brand.

Here you can find some examples of every possibility, check it now!

Free features

  • Layouts
  • Checkboxes & Radiobuttons
  • Buttons
  • Inputs file
  • Add a pretext to the beginning of the input

Pro features

  • More Layouts
  • More Checkboxes & Radiobuttons
  • More Buttons
  • More Inputs file
  • Fontawesome icons to add to text inputs
sections.faq:
Can I have a different design for each form?

Of course, each form will have its own customize.

Can I have different Gravity Form style plugins installed at the same time?

We do not recommended having other Gravity Form style plugins installed to avoid conflict and overwrite styles.

Which are the differences between the Free version and the Pro version?

The Free version includes 3 layouts, 4 checkboxes/radiobuttons styles, 1 Inputfiles style and 7 buttons styles.
The Pro Version includes much more styles from all element, Fontawesome icons for an input text and the technical support.

Can I upgrade my license?

Yes. You can upgrade (and downgrade) your license at any time. Simply login to your account area and find your subscription to access upgrading actions.

How do license keys work?

License keys are used to enable plugin updates. After purchasing an GfDesigns PRO license, you will receive a unique license key (alongside your GfDesigns PRO plugin download). This key can be activated from your WordPress dashboard’s plugin page. License keys can be activated, deactivated and upgraded at any time.

How can I update my license?

You can update my license from here: Account.

Do I need to know how to program to use this plugin?

No, you donâ€™t need to program. You have all the layouts just in one click.

If No changes occurs after installing the plugin, hat can I do?

From Settings-> Designs of each form, it must be activated and customized as you want.

What are the requirements to run GfDesigns?

To install GfDesigns it is essential to have previously installed the Gravity Forms plugin.

How do I contact to Support Service?

If you have any problem with the plugin, contact us on Support. Please, ensure that you have the license activated

What payment methods do you accept?

We use exclusively Stripe who can accept all major debit and credit cards from customers in every country.
sections.changelog:
2.0.4

  • Compatible up to: Gravity Forms 2.7.3
  • Compatible up to: WordPress 6.2

2.0.3

  • Compatible up to: Gravity Forms 2.6.8
  • Compatible up to: WordPress 6.1.1

2.0.2

  • Fixed compatibility with webkit browsers

2.0.1

  • Fixed button colors and styles bug

2.0

  • Added Fixed pretext feature
  • Added Icon fontawesome to fields
  • Added Button styles
  • Added More checkboxes and radio styles

1.0

  • initial version.
